input_text:
Job Title: Process Engineer

Location: Birmingham, AL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Summary

Industry leader seeks an Process Engineer.The primary responsibility of the Process Engineer is to enhance the production process through the application of analytical tools, data analysis, and collaborative teamwork to formulate and implement actions and projects.This is a financially strong company and a great place to work. Competitive benefits, relocation assistance, and real opportunity for growth. Start your career right! Note: you must be able to work in the United States without present or future visa sponsorship.

location: BIRMINGHAM, Alabama

job type: Permanent

salary: $90,000 - 105,000 per year

work hours: 8am to 4pm

education: Bachelors

Responsibilities

Responsibilities

Spearhead continuous improvement projects Responsible for floor-level process engineering efforts Mentor Operators and Technicians on methods of improving efficiencies

Requirements

BS Engineering (Mechanical or Material Science preferred, open to similar) 3+ years' experience in plant floor-level process engineering Team player mindset, leadership abilities Desire to be on the plant floor (this is not a desk job!)

The Essential Functions Of This Role Include

wearing steel toe shoes

Qualifications

Experience level: Entry LevelMinimum 2 years of experienceEducation: Bachelors (required)

skills: 

Process ControlManufacturingLeanFailure Analysis Corrective ActionsSteel

Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

At Randstad, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants. If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please contact HRsupport@randstadusa.com.

Pay offered to a successful candidate will be based on several factors including the candidate's education, work experience, work location, specific job duties, certifications, etc. In addition, Randstad offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, an incentive and recognition program, and 401K contribution (all benefits are based on eligibility).

Applications accepted on ongoing basis until filled.

Experience Level (if available): None
